headline: Verra Mobility appoints Stacey Moser to lead its Commercial Services business
summary: Verra Mobility Corporation (NASDAQ: VRRM), a leading provider of smart mobility technology solutions, announced today that Stacey Moser has been appointed as Executive Vice President and General Manager of the company's Commercial Services business unit effective July 21, 2025. She will report directly to David Roberts, CEO of Verra Mobility.
